description:
Filmmaker Quentin Tarantino has made a number of hits throughout his career. One of these hits, split into two films, is none other than Kill Bill. Many fans have wanted a “third” film over the years, however, and now Quentin Tarantino has confirmed that “Kill Bill 3” will not happen. Tarantino discussed the possibility of [...]

The post Quentin Tarantino Confirms ‘Kill Bill 3’ Will Not Happen appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Quentin Tarantino Confirms ‘Kill Bill 3’ Will Not Happen

description:
The upcoming Disney Plus series Daredevil: Born Again is following its predecessors in more ways than one. The series will once again see the return of actors Charlie Cox and Vincent D’Onofrio as Daredevil and Kingpin, respectively, in addition to several other familiar faces. Now, according to Brad Winderbaum, the series will also include “some [...]

The post ‘Daredevil: Born Again’ To Include “Some Of The Most Brutal Action” In The MCU appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘Daredevil: Born Again’ To Include “Some Of The Most Brutal Action” In The MCU

description:
The DC Universe is being actively developed, with Superman: Legacy set to kick things off on the big screen in 2025. Of course, there are several television projects in development, and this includes a Green Lantern series titled Lanterns. Now a new report claims that none other than Josh Brolin is reportedly wanted for the [...]

The post Josh Brolin Reportedly Wanted For Hal Jordan In ‘Lanterns’ Series appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Josh Brolin Reportedly Wanted For Hal Jordan In ‘Lanterns’ Series
